name: Wigglytuff

attacks.name: Lullaby
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Do the Wave
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

flavorText: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

strengths: Do the Wave can deal up to 60 damage with full bench
Only 3 Colorless energy - works with any type
weaknesses: Requires full bench for maximum damage
synergies: Double Colorless Energy - Powers Do the Wave quickly
Pokemon with free retreat - Keep bench full
Bill/Professor Oak - Draw to fill bench
counters: Bench damage - Reduces Do the Wave damage

competitiveHistory: Wigglytuff was the centerpiece of one of the most popular and successful deck archetypes of the era. 'Do the Wave' decks focused on filling the bench quickly and powering out Wigglytuff with Double Colorless Energy. With a full bench of 5 Pokemon, Do the Wave dealt 60 damage for just 3 energy, making it extremely efficient.

rulings.ruling: Do the Wave counts all of YOUR Benched Pokemon, not your opponent's.
With 5 Benched Pokemon, Do the Wave deals 10 + 50 = 60 damage.
Lullaby automatically puts the Defending Pokemon to sleep - no coin flip required.
If your bench is empty, Do the Wave only deals 10 damage.
